// Strings for application Hello blank fragment Specify the connection key Key Let's connect! Your connection key is #00000 Start the Connection! Home Get file Start new connection with someone to get a file you need Send file Join an existing connection to send a file Settings and so on If you want to change somethingâ€¦ Mars Uploading files Show ip Choose file firstFragment Language: Your connection key is Download files! Delete Connection Ready Copy this key-code and send it to sender! STATUS: "Yes" "No" "Are you sure you want to delete the connection? The file may currently be being transferred to you!" When your files will be ready to be downloaded The circle below should change color from red to green! Click on the button below to select and upload the files! Don't forget to click the 'Ready' button 
 when the files will be ready to be downloaded! Change application theme Contact with me Theme: Write theme Text: Text
